value.title: Coronavirus: Onondaga County schools might stay closed until late April
value.excerpt: Syracuse, N.Y. -- Onondaga County schools might be closed until at least late April, County Executive Ryan McMahon suggested today. McMahon had originally ordered K-12 schools to close until April 14 because of the novel coronavirus pandemic, but he hinted today that might be too early. value.title: Capistrano Unified extends school closure through May 1 because of coronavirus
value.excerpt: Capistrano Unified School District has joined districts throughout Orange County by extending its school closures three weeks into early May because of the coronavirus crisis, a move that casts doubt to whether high school sports will resume this spring. The district’s Board of Trustees met Wednesday and extended its shutdown through May 1.
